sentence.Network_en: I have doubts about the advisability of surgery in this case.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于该病例做手术的可行性，我持有疑问。

sentence.Network_en: He talked of the advisability of getting rid of him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是谈谈赶掉他的好处.

sentence.Network_en: This advisability of deuteration is unnecessary with single crystals.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于单晶,氘化的这种优点并不是必不可少的.

entry.def: If you tell someone that it is advisable to do something, you are suggesting that they should do it, because it is sensible or is likely to achieve the result they want.

example.ex: Because of the popularity of the region, it is advisable to book hotels or camp sites in advance...
example.tran: 鉴于该地区很受人们青睐，最好提前预订旅馆或宿营地。

example.ex: It is generally not advisable for expectant mothers to travel by air after the 28th week of pregnancy.
example.tran: 怀孕28周以后的准妈妈一般不宜乘坐飞机出行。

sentences.sentence: "they questioned the advisability of our policy"
